title: Baby Carrier
description: blue pounded indigo; top red band, 7\" with five embroidered medallions; center has four 5-1/2\" squares with floral embroidery on red forming 13-1/2\" square; unlined
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
